original_text: You believe in Christ, and you are his servants. That is like you are offering yourselves as a sacrifice to God. Perhaps I will soon have to die. Then my blood would be like drink that I am pouring on your sacrifice, to please God. So, if I have to die now, I will be happy. And we should all be happy together.
korean_text: 만일 너희 믿음의 제물과 섬김 위에 내가 나를 전제로 드릴지라도 나는 기뻐하고 너희 무리와 함께 기뻐하리니

sentences.original_text: That is like you are offering yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 자신을 드리는 것과 같으니

sentences.original_text: Perhaps I will soon have to die
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 나는 곧 죽게 될지도 모른다

sentences.original_text: Then my blood would be like drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내 피는 마실 것과 같을 것이라

sentences.original_text: that I am pouring on your sacrifice
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 제물 위에 내가 쏟아 붓는

sentences.original_text: So, if I have to die now
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 만약 내가 지금 죽어야 한다면

sentences.original_text: And we should all be happy together
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 모두 함께 기뻐해야 한다
